segments.text: Room service . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , tomorrow is my friend's birthday.Could I arrange a birthday party for him through you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to order a large birthday cake , several kinds of cold dishes , pastries and fruits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got whiskey and brandy but I need some beer and soda.That ' s all .
segments.speaker: S2
